title: MIHAWK & AOKIJI VS WHITEBEARD!! One Piece Marineford Episode 462 REACTION + REVIEW
author: Unknown
description: A reaction and review video covering the epic moments of Episode 462, including Mihawk and Aokiji's confrontations with Whitebeard during the Marineford War.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Focuses only on events in Episode 462

title: One Piece - Marineford Arc (Episodes 457-491) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the entire Marineford Arc, covering episodes 457-491 including Episode 462. The review discusses how the arc lived up to the hype and how One Piece goes extremely dark during this arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Marineford Arc

title: Marineford Review
author: One Piece Bazaar
description: A review calling Marineford 'the best arc by far, entirely gripping from beginning to end, with so many twists and turns, characters, fights, and surprises.'

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Marineford Arc

title: The One Piece Virgin - Marineford Arc Discussion
author: The One Piece Virgin Podcast
description: Podcast discussion of the Marineford Arc, with hosts calling it 'a mammoth of an ARC,' 'the best ARC ever,' and 'a masterpiece.'

title: One Piece: Whitebeard's Gura Gura no Mi Devil Fruit, Explained
author: GameRant
description: An article explaining the mechanics and significance of Whitebeard's Gura Gura no Mi Devil Fruit, featured prominently in Episode 462.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains information about the Gura Gura no Mi throughout the series

title: One Piece: 5 Strange Secrets About Whitebeard's Gura Gura no Mi Devil Fruit Power
author: CBR
description: An article exploring five secrets and lesser-known facts about Whitebeard's earthquake-generating Devil Fruit power.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains information about the Gura Gura no Mi throughout the series including post-Whitebeard
